WelcomeMessage.author: Welcome
WelcomeMessage.title: Welcome
WelcomeMessage.description: Hello %username%, welcome to our server! If you have any questions or issues, feel free to open a ticket.

LeaveMessage.author: Goodbye
LeaveMessage.title: Goodbye
LeaveMessage.description: %username% has left the server. We wish them all the best.

SetupMessage.author: Verification System
SetupMessage.title: Please Verify Yourself
SetupMessage.description: Press the button to verify yourself.

CapchaMessage.author: Verification System
CapchaMessage.title: Please Verify Yourself
CapchaMessage.description: Press the button and solve the CAPTCHA to verify yourself.
CapchaMessage.footer: Please enter the solution in this chat.

SuccessMessage.author: Verification System
SuccessMessage.title: Verification Successful
SuccessMessage.description: You have successfully verified yourself. Welcome to the server!

FailureMessage.author: Verification System
FailureMessage.title: Verification Failed
FailureMessage.description: Verification failed. Please try again or contact support.

Messages.TimeError: You didn't respond within the allotted time. Verification has been canceled.
Messages.ChannelMessage: Please verify yourself in the %channel% channel.
Messages.DMMessage: Please verify yourself in your Direct Messages.

SetupMessage.author: Ticket System
SetupMessage.title: Create a Ticket
SetupMessage.description: Select the category below for the ticket you wish to open.

TicketActions.description_1: %target% has been successfully added to the ticket.
TicketActions.description_2: %target% has been successfully removed from the ticket.

Clear.description_1: No messages from the user were found that are less than 14 days old.
Clear.description_3: No messages were found that are less than 14 days old.
Clear.description_4: Successfully deleted %size% messages from the channel.

EditEmbed.ErrorMessage: The embed could not be changed. Please ensure that the message you are trying to edit is from me and is an embed.
